headers.subject: [tosdr:2814] Scrubly.com - you can delete your account and that also deletes your associated data...

html:
you can cancel your account and if you do so, all your associated data will be deleted and cannot be recovered
You may terminate your Scrubly account at any time and for any reason by navigating to the Account page and clicking Cancel Account. An email or phone call to Scrubly does not constitute a valid and accepted form of cancellation. Upon Cancellation, all of your User Data will be deleted from Scrubly servers and cannot be recovered.
 

Content that is deleted is then exempted from their license...but they may keep a backup of the deleted content...which it's not clear what they might do with that
You may remove your User Content from the Site at any time. If you choose to remove your User Content, the license granted above will automatically expire, however you acknowledge that the Scrubly may retain backups of your User Content. 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Scrubly.com - you can delete your account and that also deletes your associated data...
text:
you can cancel your account and if you do so, all your associated data will 
be deleted and cannot be recovered

> You may terminate your Scrubly account at any time and for any reason by 
> navigating to the Account page and clicking Cancel Account. An email or 
> phone call to Scrubly does not constitute a valid and accepted form of 
> cancellation. Upon Cancellation, all of your User Data will be deleted from 
> Scrubly servers and cannot be recovered.

 

Content that is deleted is then exempted from their license...but they may 
keep a backup of the deleted content...which it's not clear what they might 
do with that

> You may remove your User Content from the Site at any time. If you choose 
> to remove your User Content, the license granted above will automatically 
> expire, however you acknowledge that the Scrubly may retain backups of your 
> User Content. 

--
